QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT distinct [state] = CASE WHEN STATE IN ('AK','AL','AR','AZ','CA','CO','CT','DC','DE','FL', 'GA','HI','IA','ID','IL','IN','KS','KY','LA','MA', 'MD','ME','MI','MN','MO','MS','MT','NC','ND','NE', 'NH','NJ','NM','NV','NY','OH','OK','OR','PA','PR', 'RI','SC','SD','TN','TX','UT','VA','VT','WA','WI', 'WV','WY') THEN [state] ELSE 'UN' END, [state] as source FROM MEMBER_DETAIL
